name: Just Give Up
description:
Just Give Up - is 2D arcade game ,where u play as little star that u need to navigate it through spikes,flames,ninja stars,swords and etc... The game goal is to don't give up to score as much as possible ,challenge your friends to beat your score,even compete world wide :D

*FEATURES
-LeaderBoard
-Simple drag control
-One character
-Simple ,but hard gameplay
-No ads

*Good Luck
